page.title: 16Hotels
page.content: Our teacher arranged for us to visit the Bear Hotel,Newtown,to talk to the Assistant Manageress.She informed us that there were 36 bedrooms in the hotel,all with colour TV and kettle.10 of the bedrooms had showers.The price of a Single Room was Â£26.,and a Double Room Â£38,and children sharing a room with parents have free accommodation but they pay Â£2.50 for breakfast.There are children's Menues at a special charge.25 people are employed full-time and 25 part-time.The hotel caters for Wedding Receptions, functions and coach parties.There are no special facilities for Disabled People.There are 50 rooms altogether including two bars and 2 restaurants. Prices for drinks are 74p for a pint of beer and 58p for whisky.The busiest times are Christmas and August Bank Holiday.
